important; display: block; max-height: 80%; max-width: 80%; margin: auto; " width="55" >
AI Agent Development Internship

Hi Varshith Reddy,

Thank you for your interest in the role of 'AI Agent Development Internship'

Email Parser Agent

Accepts email body text (plain or HTML)

Extracts sender name, request intent, urgency

Returns formatted CRM-style record

Stores conversation ID + parsed metadata in memory

 

Shared Memory Module (Lightweight)

Should store:

Input metadata (source, type, timestamp)

Extracted fields per agent

Thread/conversation ID if available

You can use Redis, SQLite, or in-memory store

 

Memory must be readable across agents

 

End-to-End Flow Example

User uploads an email body → Classifier detects "email + RFQ intent"

Routed to Email Parser → Extracts sender, request, urgency

 

Memory stores output

If RFQ references an attached JSON→ also route to JSON agent

Combined structured output is returned (or logged to mock CRM)

 

Tech Stack Recommendations

Python (Langchain / FastAPI preferred)

LLMs (OpenAI, Gemini, or open-source)

Memory: Redis / SQLite / JSON memory class

Docker (optional, bonus)

 

Submission Requirements

Working Video is a must

GitHub repo with:

README

important;

	}

metadata.filename: Your application has been accepted for the role of AI Agent Development Internship!.eml

metadata.subject:
Your application has been accepted for the role of AI Agent
 Development Internship!

content.body:
AI Agent Development Internship

Hi Varshith Reddy,

Thank you for your interest in the role of 'AI Agent Development Internship'!

As part of your next round of Interview. 

For more updates about the company make sure to follow the company page on Linkedin. Flowbit AI

Multi-Format Intake Agent with Intelligent Routing & Context Memory”

Objective

Build a multi-agent AI system that can accept data in PDF, JSON, or Email (text) format, intelligently classify the input type and purpose, and then route it to the right specialized agent for extraction. The system should maintain context (e.g., sender, topic, last extracted fields) to support downstream chaining or audits.

 

System Overview

You are to build 3 core agents, all orchestrated through a central Classifier Agent:

 

1. Classifier Agent

Receives raw input (file/email/JSON body)

Classifies:

Format: PDF / JSON / Email

Intent: Invoice, RFQ, Complaint, Regulation, etc.

Routes to the appropriate extraction agent

Adds format + intent to shared memory

 

2. JSON Agent

Accepts arbitrary JSON (e.g., webhook payloads, APIs)

Extracts and re-formats data to a defined FlowBit schema

Identifies anomalies or missing fields

 

3. Email Parser Agent

Accepts email body text (plain or HTML)

Extracts sender name, request intent, urgency

Returns formatted CRM-style record

Stores conversation ID + parsed metadata in memory

 

Shared Memory Module (Lightweight)

Should store:

Input metadata (source, type, timestamp)

Extracted fields per agent

Thread/conversation ID if available

You can use Redis, SQLite, or in-memory store

 

Memory must be readable across agents

 

End-to-End Flow Example

User uploads an email body → Classifier detects "email + RFQ intent"

Routed to Email Parser → Extracts sender, request, urgency

 

Memory stores output

If RFQ references an attached JSON→ also route to JSON agent

Combined structured output is returned (or logged to mock CRM)

 

Tech Stack Recommendations

Python (Langchain / FastAPI preferred)

LLMs (OpenAI, Gemini, or open-source)

Memory: Redis / SQLite / JSON memory class

Docker (optional, bonus)

 

Submission Requirements

Working Video is a must

GitHub repo with:

README.md

Sample input files (PDFs, JSONs, emails)

Folder structure: /agents, /mcp, /memory, /data, /utils

Sample output logs or screenshots



All the Best!

Regards,
Flowbit Private Limited Team

View Opportunity

Join our evergrowing unstoppable community

Get the Unstop app

Queries? We're just one email away: support@unstop.com © 2025 Unstop. All rights reserved

Tech Stack Recommendations

Python (Langchain / FastAPI preferred)

LLMs (OpenAI, Gemini, or open-source)

Memory: Redis / SQLite / JSON memory class

Docker (optional, bonus)

 

Submission Requirements

Working Video is a must

GitHub repo with:

README
